dmca.title: Defamation Letter from Homestead Technologies
dmca.body:
Dear Member,
 
The original message was to remove all mention of [private], including addresses, financial information and photographs or images of [private]'s property from your site.  While you have removed. [private]'s name, as well as the photographs or images, you still refer to her as '[private]'s daughter'.  Additionally, while you place the disclaimer:
 
"[private]'s daughters name, the addresses of the properties that she owns and their photographs have been removed (and replaced with stock photographs) because of a complaint that was made by [private]'s daughter to the website host.
(The photos shown here are not pictures of homes owned by [private]'s daughter.)",
 
the sale price for the property is listed on the page.
 
Unfortunately, this still violates the Homestead Member Agreement clause regarding posting of personal information without that party's consent.  We have again removed the page.  Again, to reiterate, do not post any information about [private], including but not limited to addresses, photographs of property or financial information.
 
Regards
 
Homestead Abuse Team
 
 



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
From: [private]@safe-mail.net
Sent: Thursday, July 05, 2007 7:14 PM
To: Share_HS_Abuse
Subject: Re: RE: Homestead Abuse Team (esotericfreedom.com)


Dear Homestead Abuse Team,
 
Re:http://www.esotericfreedom.com/Properties
 
I have reposted the following page and I have omitted [private]'s name, the addresses of the properties that she owns as well as the photographs of those properties.
[private]'s information is in no other place on the website.
I hope that this satisfies your request.
Best wishes.
 
http://www.esotericfreedom.com/Properties.html

 
----- Original Message ----- 
From: Share_HS_Abuse 
To: Share_HS_Abuse ; [private]@safe-mail.net
Sent: Thursday, July 05, 2007 8:40 PM
Subject: Spam: RE: Homestead Abuse Team (esotericfreedom.com)


Dear Member,
 
As a passive conduit, we cannot monitor user websites, but we respond to breaches of our user agreement when we learn of such behavior.
 
The page following page had addresses and photographs of [private]'s property.  We have taken action to remove the page. 
http://www.esotericfreedom.com/Properties.html

Do not repost the page with [private]'s information, or post Ms. Kaye's information on any other page.

Regards

Homestead Abuse Team




--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
From: Share_HS_Abuse 
Sent: Monday, July 02, 2007 12:33 PM
To: [private]@safe-mail.net; Share_HS_Abuse
Subject: Homestead Abuse Team (esotericfreedom.com)


Dear Member,
 
As a passive conduit, we cannot monitor user websites, but we respond to breaches of our user agreement when we learn of such behavior.

Homestead has received a complaint that you are posting a third party's personal information without their approval.  Posting of another party's personal information without their consent is prohibited in the Homestead Member agreement.
 
Please remove any mention of [private], including addresses, financial information and photographs or images of [private]'s property from your site.  Please do this by July 5, 2007.
 
Regards
 
Homestead Abuse Team
